events.name: The nuts-n-bolts that can blow your chances in a selection process
events.subtitle: October 16, 2020
events.theEvent:
Do you ever get the feeling that you have a strong profile, but you are still not getting called for an interview abroad? You might be missing a crucial thing and don't even know it.


But worry no more, we are here to help.


Join us for a FREE webinar on October 16th, 8 AM (PST) and find out how you can improve your international profile and get more interviews.
events.theCandidates:
VanHack is looking for candidates with 3 or more years of professional experience.

Candidates also need to have advanced or fluent English and be able to attend the Webinar event on October 16 in person.

Most importantly, candidates must be willing to get a job in Canada and/or Europe, and to relocate in the second semester of 2020.
